titles.title: Congressional Parking Act
To terminate funds for congressional parking attendants and to charge for parking.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Personnel and Police.

bill.summary: 2/2/1994--Introduced. Congressional Parking Act - Prohibits funds from being appropriated for congressional parking attendants or administering congressional parking attendants beginning in FY 1995. Provides that Members of Congress, staff, and visitors shall be charged market rates for parking within the buildings and parking lots in the Capitol Hill complex.
